title: [BUG] SKGLSurfaceView freezes page when returning from the background.
body:
**Description**
Using a SKGLSurfaceView freezes the app when returning from the background. In my case, it is added inside a fragment, and i am not doing anything else, than adding it to the fragment.

**Expected Behavior**
It should not freeze.

**Actual Behavior**
It freezes.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.80.2
- IDE:  Visual studio on Mac
- Platform Target Frameworks:
  - Android: Android11
- Target Devices:
  - Google Pixel 4a (5G)
